title: Demonstrator holding the Qur'an and a crucifix
description: Photographer's description: This photo was taken before Mubarak's step down, it shows a man holding a cross and the holy Qur'an, trying to express how Copts & Muslims are one hand against Mubarak because Mubarak's gang specially "NDP" were trying to make a sectarian strife between Muslims & Copts.
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Coptic Church; Egypt; Islam; Protest movements; Revolutions
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Demonstrator holding the Qur'an and a crucifix
